name: Untitled Gravity Test Game
description:
In UGTG, you play as Test Subject, an employee of Futuristic Products Incorporated.

Your goal is to run a series of test on a state-of-the-art gravity suit.

Feedback can be giving through this survey: https://forms.gle/DAXvjouAcXPket6h6

Controls:

Move:

        - Keyboard :

            - Left: A Key

            - Right: D Key

        - Controller: Left Stick

Jump:

        - Keyboard: W Key

        - Controller: A Button (Xbox)

Pause:

        - Keyboard: Escape Key

        - Controller: B Button (Xbox)

Gravity Direction:

        - Keyboard:

            - Left: Left Arrow Key

            - Right: Right Arrow Key

            - Up: Up Arrow Key

            - Down: Down Arrow Key

        - Controller:

            - Left: D-pad Left

            - Right: D-pad Right

            - Up: D-pad Up

            - Down: D-pad Down

        - Slow Down: Hold Direction Key/D-pad
